overview: From 2025-08-22 to 2025-08-23, elizaos/eliza had 2 new PRs (1 merged), 2 new issues, and 6 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Image Generation not working in Discord
topIssues.author: harperaa
topIssues.body:
**Describe the bug**

Generated images not appearing in discord, it shows in the webui, but not in discord.

**To Reproduce**

Ask to create an image, it says here it is, and describes it, but does not show up in discord.

I see this in logs on webui. Executed action: GENERATE_IMAGE

**Expected behavior**

Image in discord.

**Screenshots**

If I am missing some permission or config needed, please let me know.  Again, it works in webui, but not in discord.

test all plugins 1. clone plugin repo 2. run `elizaos dev` and plugins should start with test character if env are provided

topPRs.title: feat(scenarios): Add comprehensive scenario testing system
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
## Summary
- Add ElizaOS scenario testing system with YAML-based test definitions
- Support for both local and E2B sandboxed testing environments  
- Comprehensive evaluation engine with action tracking and LLM judges
- Mock service support for deterministic testing
- CLI command `elizaos scenario run` for running individual scenarios
- Batch testing support with `bun run test:scenarios`

## Key Features
- **Environment Providers**: Local and E2B sandbox support with fallback
- **Mock Engine**: Service call interception and response mocking
- **Evaluation Engine**: Action tracking, response validation, trajectory analysis
- **LLM Judgment**: AI-powered evaluation of test results
- **Comprehensive Documentation**: Examples, specs, and usage guides

## Files Added
- Scenario CLI command implementation
- Environment providers (Local, E2B, Mock)
- Evaluation and reporting engines
- 15+ example scenarios covering various test cases
- Comprehensive documentation and guides

## Testing
- Adds `test:scenarios` script to CLI package
- 15+ example scenarios with different complexity levels
- E2B integration with graceful fallbacks
- Mock service testing capabilities

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

topPRs.title: feat: bun build, remove tsup
topPRs.author: ChristopherTrimboli
topPRs.body:
This pull request introduces a new standardized Bun-based build system for ElizaOS packages, replacing the previous use of `tsup` and related tooling. It adds reusable build utilities, custom build scripts for `@elizaos/api-client` and `@elizaos/cli`, and updates package scripts and dependencies to leverage these changes. Additionally, there are targeted fixes and improvements to messaging service payloads, environment setup, and process management.

**Build System Modernization**

* Added `build-utils.ts` with reusable Bun build utilities for cleaning, building, copying assets, and generating TypeScript declarations, enabling consistent builds across packages.
* Replaced `tsup` with Bun-based scripts in `@elizaos/api-client` and `@elizaos/cli`, including custom build scripts (`build.ts`) and removal of `tsup.config.ts`. Updated package scripts to use Bun for build, watch, and clean operations. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-c64f755bd238752518269ba933743007c8b7c2b3db7b2663c3cfd8eee3e66ee1R1-R59) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-fd8bcdbf9ab496c42cc8f5a68cbb792d0cd44d138d9f35e6ef960ac6a7b97168L10-R16) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-fd8bcdbf9ab496c42cc8f5a68cbb792d0cd44d138d9f35e6ef960ac6a7b97168L24) [[4]](diffhunk://#diff-1870665c82b8dca54d6e63c49dfa1077b64d4b37bc32f66610ff543ad7f00dcbL1-L18) [[5]](diffhunk://#diff-38a7bfc3de9135d0af986757713f0fc589a906dd9be2f715932e303ae8bc7e4cR1-R82) [[6]](diffhunk://#diff-6e2e2a1851648938b325ba84de634407a4e69a644ea61102df15ca4a8a7a9758L40-R44) [[7]](diffhunk://#diff-6e2e2a1851648938b325ba84de634407a4e69a644ea61102df15ca4a8a7a9758R59) [[8]](diffhunk://#diff-6e2e2a1851648938b325ba84de634407a4e69a644ea61102df15ca4a8a7a9758L71-L75)
* Updated monorepo-level build and clean scripts in `package.json` to filter out certain packages, remove `tsup`, and improve cache handling for faster, more reliable builds. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-7ae45ad102eab3b6d7e7896acd08c427a9b25b346470d7bc6507b6481575d519L11-R19) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-7ae45ad102eab3b6d7e7896acd08c427a9b25b346470d7bc6507b6481575d519L52)

**Messaging Service Improvements**

* Refactored payload construction for channel creation methods in `MessagingService` to match server expectations, including proper handling of metadata, participant IDs, and DM channel parameters.
* Fixed type handling in participant filtering logic for channel updates.

**TypeScript Declaration Generation**

* Enabled TypeScript declaration file (`.d.ts`) generation via Bun build scripts and updated `tsconfig.build.json` to include `"declaration": true`. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-c64f755bd238752518269ba933743007c8b7c2b3db7b2663c3cfd8eee3e66ee1R1-R59) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-38a7bfc3de9135d0af986757713f0fc589a906dd9be2f715932e303ae8bc7e4cR1-R82) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-c4d3cf5a942b53c98c3bd2b84fbc766b044cfa190d26f1a249dd7357486a7a5aL4-R5)

**Process and Environment Management**

* Improved environment variable setup in CLI server manager to filter out undefined values and ensure proper module resolution.
* Updated server process termination logic to ensure graceful shutdown and state cleanup.
* Minor fix to plugin upgrade progress event handling for more robust logging.
* Removed unused `writeFileSync` import in CLI plugin environment variable utilities.

topPRs.title: feat: Add AI Gateway plugin - Universal access to 100+ AI models
topPRs.author: Dexploarer
topPRs.body:
## Summary
Adds a universal AI Gateway plugin that provides access to 100+ AI models through Vercel AI Gateway and other OpenAI-compatible gateways.

## Features
- ðŸš€ **100+ AI Models** - OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Meta, Mistral, and more through unified gateways
- ðŸ”„ **Universal Gateway Support** - Works with Vercel AI Gateway, OpenRouter, and any OpenAI-compatible endpoint
- ðŸ’¾ **Response Caching** - Built-in LRU cache for cost optimization
- ðŸ“Š **Built-in Telemetry** - Track usage and performance metrics
- âš¡ **High Performance** - Automatic retry logic and connection pooling
- ðŸŽ¯ **Multiple Actions** - Text generation, image generation, embeddings, and model listing

## Highlights

### Vercel AI Gateway Integration
- Optimized for Vercel's AI Gateway with proper URL format (`https://ai-gateway.vercel.sh/v1`)
- Supports Vercel's colon-based model naming convention (e.g., `openai:gpt-4o`)
- Compatible with Vercel's app attribution headers for analytics

### Flexible Provider Support
- Works with any OpenAI-compatible API endpoint
- Automatic model format detection (colon vs slash separators)
- Seamless switching between providers with minimal configuration

### Enterprise Features
- Response caching with configurable TTL
- Automatic retry logic with exponential backoff
- OIDC authentication support for enterprise deployments
- Comprehensive error handling and fallback mechanisms

## Installation

The plugin is already published to npm for immediate use:
```bash
npm install @promptordie/plugin-aigateway
```

After merge, it will be available as:
```bash
npm install @elizaos/plugin-aigateway
```

## Configuration

```env
# Required
AIGATEWAY_API_KEY=your_api_key_here

# Optional (defaults shown)
AIGATEWAY_BASE_URL=https://ai-gateway.vercel.sh/v1
AIGATEWAY_DEFAULT_MODEL=openai:gpt-4o-mini
AIGATEWAY_LARGE_MODEL=openai:gpt-4o
AIGATEWAY_EMBEDDING_MODEL=openai:text-embedding-3-small
AIGATEWAY_CACHE_TTL=300
AIGATEWAY_MAX_RETRIES=3
```

## Usage

```typescript
import aiGatewayPlugin from '@elizaos/plugin-aigateway';

const character = {
    name: 'MyAgent',
    plugins: [aiGatewayPlugin],
    settings: {
        AIGATEWAY_API_KEY: 'your-api-key'
    }
};
```

## Test Plan
- [x] Built successfully with `bun run build`
- [x] All TypeScript types validated
- [x] Published to npm registry for testing
- [x] Tested with Vercel AI Gateway
- [x] Tested model provider registration
- [ ] Community testing welcomed

## Documentation
Full documentation and examples included in packages/plugin-aigateway/README.md

## Related Links
- NPM Package: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@promptordie/plugin-aigateway
- Vercel AI Gateway Docs: https://vercel.com/docs/ai-gateway
